languages.text: "Вам не нужна война с {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}навигаторским Домом{/g}, Вольный Торговец. Как союзники мы могли бы добиться гораздо большего. Дом Орселлио так же, как и вы, является пострадавшей стороной в этом деле. Ренегаты проникли в наши ряды, ослабили нас, подставили перед Вольным Торговцем и чуть не убили самое сокровенное, что у нас есть — наше дитя! Неужели вы думаете, что мы желали смерти той, кому суждено привести Дом к величию?"

traits.locale_text: "Вам не нужна война с {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}навигаторским домом{/g} навигаторским домом, Вольный Торговец. Как союзники мы могли бы добиться гораздо большего. Дом Орселлио так же, как и вы, является пострадавшей стороной в этом деле. Ренегаты проникли в наши ряды, ослабили нас, подставили перед Вольным Торговцем и чуть не убили самое сокровенное, что у нас есть — наше дитя! Неужели вы думаете, что мы желали смерти той, кому суждено привести Дом к величию?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House, Rogue Trader. We could achieve much more as allies. House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"
languages.original_text: "Вам не нужна война с {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}навигаторским Домом{/g}, Вольный Торговец. Как союзники мы могли бы добиться гораздо большего. Дом Орселлио так же, как и вы, является пострадавшей стороной в этом деле. Ренегаты проникли в наши ряды, ослабили нас, подставили перед Вольным Торговцем и чуть не убили самое сокровенное, что у нас есть — наше дитя! Неужели вы думаете, что мы желали смерти той, кому суждено привести Дом к величию?"

traits.locale_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}navigator house{/g}, Rogue Trader. You could achieve much more as an ally. Just like yourself, House Orsellio is the injured party. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, framed us before the Rogue Trader and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to bring our House to greatness?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}navigator house{/g}, Rogue Trader. You could achieve much more as an ally. Just like yourself, House Orsellio is the injured party. Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to bring our House to greatness?"

House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “您恐怕不会希望与{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}之间开战，行商浪人。我们可以成为盟友，共同取得无数伟大的成就。在这件事情上，奥赛罗家族与您一样，也同样是受害者。叛徒渗透到了我们之中，削弱了我们的力量，挑起了我们与行商浪人之间的冲突，还差点杀害了我们最宝贵的东西——我们尊贵的孩子！您真的认为，我们打算杀害引领我们的家族走向辉煌的那个人吗？”
languages.original_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House, Rogue Trader. We could achieve much more as allies. House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"

traits.locale_text: “您恐怕不会希望与{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}之间开战，行商浪人。我们可以成为盟友，共同取得无数伟大的成就。在这件事情上，奥塞罗家族与您一样，也同样是受害者。叛徒渗透到了我们之中，削弱了我们的力量，挑起了我们与行商浪人之间的冲突，还差点杀害了我们最宝贵的东西——我们尊贵的孩子！您真的认为，我们打算杀害引领我们的家族走向辉煌的那个人吗？”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «No quiere una guerra con una casa de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, Comerciante Independiente. Como aliados, podríamos llegar mucho más lejos. La casa Orsellio es la víctima en todo esto, igual que usted. Los renegados se infiltraron en nuestras filas, nos debilitaron, nos pusieron en entredicho ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y han estado a punto de matar a la más valiosa de nosotros, ¡nuestra noble hija! ¿Acaso cree que querríamos matar a quien está destinada a llevarnos a la grandeza?».
languages.original_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House, Rogue Trader. We could achieve much more as allies. House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"

traits.locale_text: «No quiere una guerra con una casa de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, Comerciante Independiente. Como aliados, podríamos llegar mucho más lejos. La casa Orsellio es la víctima en todo esto, igual que usted. Los renegados se infiltraron en nuestras filas, nos debilitaron, nos pusieron en entredicho ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y han estado a punto de matar a la más valiosa de nosotros, ¡nuestra noble hija! ¿Acaso cree que querríamos matar a quien está destinada a llevarnos a la grandeza?».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の家との戦争はお望みではないはずだ。同盟を結べば、もっと多くのことが成し遂げられる。オーセリオ家はあなた方と同様、この件では損害を被った当事者だ。反逆者達は我々の仲間に入り込み、我々を弱体化させた 自由開拓者を巻き込み、我々の最も貴重なものである高貴な子供を殺しかけたのだ！我が家を大いなるものへと導く宿命を背負った者の死を、我々が本当に望んだと思うか？」
languages.original_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House, Rogue Trader. We could achieve much more as allies. House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}の家との戦争はお望みではないはずだ。同盟を結べば、もっと多くのことが成し遂げられる。オーセリオ家はあなた方と同様、この件では損害を被った当事者だ。反逆者達は我々の仲間に入り込み、我々を弱体化させた 自由開拓者を巻き込み、我々の最も貴重なものである高貴な子供を殺しかけたのだ！我が家を大いなるものへと導く宿命を背負った者の死を、我々が本当に望んだと思うか？」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Ihr wollt keinen Krieg mit einem Haus der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir könnten als Verbündete viel mehr erreichen. Das Haus Orsellio ist in dieser Sache eine geschädigte Partei, genau wie Ihr. Die Abtrünnigen haben unsere Reihen infiltriert, uns geschwächt, uns vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} als Täter hingestellt und fast das Wertvollste getötet, was wir haben – unser prächtiges Kind! Meint Ihr wirklich, wir wünschen der Person den Tod, die bestimmt ist, unser Haus zu wahrer Größe zu führen?"
languages.original_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House, Rogue Trader. We could achieve much more as allies. House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt keinen Krieg mit einem Haus der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir könnten als Verbündete viel mehr erreichen. Das Haus Orsellio ist in dieser Sache eine geschädigte Partei, genau wie Ihr. Die Abtrünnigen haben unsere Reihen infiltriert, uns geschwächt, uns vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} als Täter hingestellt und fast das Wertvollste getötet, was wir haben – unser prächtiges Kind! Meint Ihr wirklich, wir wünschen der Person den Tod, die bestimmt ist, unser Haus zu wahrer Größe zu führen?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Vous ne voudriez pas déclencher une guerre avec une maison de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. De plus, en tant qu'alliés, nous pourrions accomplir des merveilles. Dans cette affaire, la maison Orsellio est tout autant une victime que vous. Nous avons été infiltrés et affaiblis par ces renégats, qui s'en sont non seulement pris {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, mais également à ce que nous avons de plus précieux : notre noble Enfant ! Croyez-vous vraiment que nous aurions souhaité la mort de celle qui est destinée à apporter gloire et fortune à notre maison ? »
languages.original_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House, Rogue Trader. We could achieve much more as allies. House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne voudriez pas déclencher une guerre avec une maison de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. De plus, en tant qu'alliés, nous pourrions accomplir des merveilles. Dans cette affaire, la maison Orsellio est tout autant une victime que vous. Nous avons été infiltrés et affaiblis par ces renégats, qui s'en sont non seulement pris {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, mais également à ce que nous avons de plus précieux : notre noble enfant ! Croyez-vous vraiment que nous aurions souhaité la mort de celle qui est destinée à apporter gloire et fortune à notre maison ? »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} Hanesi ile savaşa girmek işinize gelmez Hür Tacir. Müttefik olarak çok daha büyük işler başarabiliriz. Bu yaşananlardan tıpkı sizin gibi Orsellio Hanesi de zarar gördü. Hainler aramıza sızdı, bizi zayıflattı, Hür Tacir ile karşı karşıya getirdi. Neredeyse sahip olduğumuz en değerli şeyi, asil çocuğumuzu öldürüyorlardı! Kaderinde Hanemizi azamete ulaştırmak olan kişinin ölmesini ister miyiz sanıyorsunuz gerçekten?"
languages.original_text: "You do not want a war with a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} House, Rogue Trader. We could achieve much more as allies. House Orsellio is an injured party in this, just as you are. The renegades infiltrated our ranks, weakened us, implicated us before the Rogue Trader, and almost killed the most precious thing we have — our noble child! Do you really think we wished death upon the one who is destined to lead our House to greatness?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} Hanesi ile savaşa girmek işinize gelmez Hür Tacir. Müttefik olarak çok daha büyük işler başarabiliriz. Bu yaşananlardan tıpkı sizin gibi Orsellio Hanesi de zarar gördü. Hainler aramıza sızdı, bizi zayıflattı, bizi Hür Tacir ile karşı karşıya getirdi ve neredeyse sahip olduğumuz en değerli şeyi, asil çocuğumuzu öldürüyorlardı! Kaderinde Hane'mizi azamete ulaştırmak olan kişinin ölmesini ister miyiz sanıyorsunuz gerçekten?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
